thread.title: Abortion Is Not Part of Happy Princesshood

author: wsjcom
title: Abortion Is Not Part of Happy Princesshood
text:
Regarding Faith Moore’s “Planned Princesshood” (op-ed, April 3): Having raised two little girls, I have watched virtually every Disney princess movie over a 10-year-plus span. My daughters loved them all.
Here is my observation: The stories are really about the supremacy of true love. Despite the circumstances, the plot twists and turns, these princesses discover that they are indeed royal and extremely special. We cheer for them because they are courageous—but more important, because they are lovely, loving and lovable. The...
